sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Row, Col, Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; const HomeScreen = () => { const userLogin = useSelector((state) => state.userLogin); const { userInfo } = userLogin; return ( <>

Welcome to Trainee Management System

This system allows trainees to register, login, and manage their profiles. Administrators can manage all trainees with full CRUD operations.

{!userInfo ? ( <> New User? Register to create your account and access the trainee management system. Already Registered? Login to access your account and manage your profile. ) : ( <> Manage Your Profile Update your personal information and change your password. {userInfo.role === 'admin' && ( Admin Dashboard Manage all trainees, add new trainees, update or delete existing ones. )} )} ); }; export default HomeScreen;
